data.name: Chopmania
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1861260/Isletopia


About the Game

Use your harvester to deforest forests and save humanity! Wait... what?!??!

After the world has cut away too many forests, something happened... it appeared as if Earth fought back and started accelerating the growth of trees at exponential rates. Within a few years, thousands of cities became engulfed in trees and started eroding back humanity’s land. Humanity put monumental efforts into trying to keep the spread back, but it’s barely holding on.

Rumors spread that there were supernatural forces at work, fueling this exponential growth, but all efforts thus far to uncover the truth have failed...

In the last effort to save humanity, several outposts were deployed deep in the woods in an attempt to liberate the remaining cities and uncover something that would give hope back to humanity... You are in charge of one of these outposts with your trusted harvester... Go now, chop chop!



The citizens of various cities have been radioed and made aware that you have the biggest and meanest harvester around, so they count on you to reconnect them with the rest of civilization!

So, you almost got the role of a hero, but will you justify it?

Chop your way into the forest, while returning as many logs as you can back to your base to sell for profits. Don't let your capitalist mind fool you though, and instead use this only to fund your selfless efforts as you upgrade your harvester to move deeper into the woods. Remember, you are here to save humanity, not to reap profits for yourself!

Upgrade your chopping equipment

  • sell spoils of your chopping adventure
  • repair saw, harvester
  • unlock new buildings
  • increase move and chop speeds
  • increase your cargo size, and fuel limits
  • unlock new saw & fuel types
  • unlock special boosters, like bombs, refuels,...

Expand your reach

  • you’re in total control. The better you do with the harvester, the deeper the woods you’ll reveal.
  • chop strategically, find the point where you need to turn back to the base, and start again!

Explore

  • balance your chopping ambitions with your equipment’s capacity
  • find various boosters, the deeper you get

data.short_description: Chopmania is a relaxing RPG, where you drive a harvester to cut your way through overgrown forests. Reclaim humanity's land, after Earth fought back deforestation and engulfed it in plants! Uncover the mysteries and save humanity!
